images.title: SaaS Dashboard Hero
images.prompt: A sleek SaaS-style hero image showing a modern analytics dashboard. In the center, a large dashboard interface with rounded corners on a dark gradient background. The dashboard displays clean data visualizations: a line chart showing growth, key metric cards, and a minimal sidebar navigation. Floating UI elements around the main dashboard suggest depth and interactivity. Style: modern fintech UI, dark mode with soft purple and blue gradients, ultra clean, high resolution, no people, no logos.

images.title: Analytics Feature Visual
images.prompt: A modern fintech-style infographic showing data analytics capabilities. A stylized network of connected nodes on a dark background, with several nodes highlighted showing different metrics: revenue growth, user engagement, conversion rates. Thin glowing lines connect the data points, suggesting data flow. Style: flat vector illustration with neon blue, teal and violet accents, dark navy background, minimal text, clean and data-driven.

images.title: Automated Reports Feature
images.prompt: A close-up product mockup of a report generation interface. The interface is a white card on a dark gradient background. At the top, a header showing 'Monthly Report'. Below, a preview of a generated report with charts, tables, and key insights. The UI is minimal, with rounded corners, subtle shadows, and clean typography. Style: modern SaaS product shot, no people.

images.title: Integrations Ecosystem
images.prompt: A visual showing an integration ecosystem. In the center, a glowing hub icon representing the main platform. Around it, connected by thin curved lines, generic icons representing different services: database, cloud storage, messaging, analytics, CRM. Each connection has a subtle pulse animation effect (shown as gradient along the line). Dark background with the brand color accents. Style: clean, technical diagram.

images.title: Workflow Automation
images.prompt: A clean horizontal flow diagram on a dark gradient background representing workflow automation. On the left, an icon representing a trigger event. In the middle, a series of connected action nodes with icons for different operations: filter, transform, notify, save. On the right, multiple output endpoints. Thin curved arrows connect all elements. The whole diagram is minimalist, with neon blue and teal accents, thin white lines. No clutter, no extra text.

images.title: Platform Architecture Flow
images.prompt: A clean horizontal architecture diagram on a dark gradient background. On the left, icons representing data sources (API, webhooks, files). In the middle, a glowing rounded square labeled 'Processing Engine', surrounded by tiny icons of gears, filters, and analytics. On the right, output destinations (dashboard, exports, notifications). Thin curved arrows show data flow. Minimalist style with neon blue and teal accents.

style.lighting: subtle glow on the central node

images.title: Growth Metrics Chart
images.prompt: A simple, modern chart placed inside a fintech-style dashboard card on a dark background. The card shows a line chart with an upward trend, showing growth over 12 months. Key data points are highlighted with glowing dots. Below the chart, small metric cards showing percentage increases. Around the chart, faint grid lines and subtle numeric labels. Style: minimalist, data-driven, no 3D effects.

images.title: Pricing Tier Cards
images.prompt: Three vertical pricing tiles side by side on a clean dark-to-light gradient background. Left tile labeled 'Starter', middle tile 'Pro' (highlighted), right tile 'Enterprise'. Each tile is a rounded card with a simple icon at the top. Below each icon, a price placeholder. The Pro tier has a subtle glow effect indicating it's recommended. Colors: white or very light surface cards with subtle shadows, accented by brand colors for highlights.

images.title: Before/After Comparison
images.prompt: Two comparison cards side by side on a dark neutral background. Left card labeled 'Before' with a cluttered, messy interface mockup showing scattered data and confusing navigation. Right card labeled 'After' with a clean, organized dashboard showing the same data but beautifully structured. The 'After' card has a subtle glow. Style: flat, vector-like, showing clear contrast between chaos and order.

images.title: Developer API Visual
images.prompt: A high-end developer-focused visual of a code editor window floating on a dark gradient background. The editor shows highlighted code for an API integration, with syntax highlighting in teal, purple, and blue. On the right side, a response preview panel showing JSON data. Subtle icons for API, documentation, and terminal around the editor. Style: dark editor theme, developer tooling aesthetic.

images.title: Mobile App Preview
images.prompt: A smartphone mockup in portrait orientation on a dark blurred background. The phone screen shows a mobile dashboard UI with key metrics at the top, a mini chart in the middle, and quick action buttons at the bottom. The design is very clean and minimal, with rounded elements and clear hierarchy. Slight glow around the phone to suggest premium quality. No brand logos, generic but polished icons.

images.title: Abstract Background for Testimonials
images.prompt: A soft, abstract background illustration for a testimonials section. Stylized network of thin glowing lines and small nodes, creating a subtle tech pattern. A few nodes are slightly brighter, suggesting connection points. Faint grid lines and subtle circular gradients. Colors are muted purples, navy, and teal, low contrast so overlaid text remains readable. No UI elements, just an elegant tech atmosphere.
